mapper.sql: ACCIDENT_ID, GUARANTY_ID, ACCIDENT_TYPE_CD, REASON, OCCUR_DATE, PRICE_LOSSES, OTHER_NOTE, PRICES_COMPENSATION, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, CURRENCY_CD
mapper.select:
select
from TB_GRT_COLLATERAL_ACCIDENT where 1=1
AND ACCIDENT_TYPE_CD LIKE '%'||#{accidentTypeCd}||'%'
AND CURRENCY_CD LIKE '%'||#{currencyCd}||'%'
AND GUARANTY_ID LIKE '%'||#{guarantyId}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into TB_GRT_COLLATERAL_ACCIDENT (ACCIDENT_ID, GUARANTY_ID, ACCIDENT_TYPE_CD, REASON, OCCUR_DATE, PRICE_LOSSES, OTHER_NOTE, PRICES_COMPENSATION, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, CURRENCY_CD) values (#{accidentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guarantyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accidentTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{occurDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{priceLosses,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{otherNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pricesCompensation,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{currencyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ACCIDENT_ID,

mapper.update:
update TB_GRT_COLLATERAL_ACCIDENT
GUARANTY_ID = #{guarantyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCIDENT_TYPE_CD = #{accidentTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OCCUR_DATE = #{occurDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PRICE_LOSSES = #{priceLosses,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OTHER_NOTE = #{otherNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICES_COMPENSATION = #{pricesCompensation,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CURRENCY_CD = #{currencyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ACCIDENT_ID = #{accidentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
